name: Leafeon
flavorText:
Just like a plant, it uses
photosynthesis. As a result, it is
always enveloped in clear air.

previous.name: Yanmega
previous.flavorText:
By churning its wings, it creates
shock waves that inflict critical
internal injuries to foes.

next.name: Glaceon
next.flavorText:
As a protective technique, it can
completely freeze its fur to make
its hairs stand like needles.

pokemon.name: Eevee
pokemon.flavorText:
Its genetic code
is irregular.
It may mutate if it is exposed to
radiation from
element STONEs.

pokemon.name: Vaporeon
pokemon.flavorText:
Lives close to
water. Its long
tail is ridged with a fin which
is often mistaken
for a mermaid's.

pokemon.name: Jolteon
pokemon.flavorText:
It accumulates
negative ions in
the atmosphere to blast out 10000-
volt lightning
bolts.

pokemon.name: Flareon
pokemon.flavorText:
When storing
thermal energy in
its body, its temperature could
soar to over 1600
degrees.

pokemon.name: Espeon
pokemon.flavorText:
It uses the fine
hair that covers
its body to sense air currents and
predict its ene­
my's actions.

pokemon.name: Umbreon
pokemon.flavorText:
When agitated,
this POKéMON pro­
tects itself by spraying poisonous
sweat from its
pores.

pokemon.name: Leafeon
pokemon.flavorText:
Just like a plant, it uses
photosynthesis. As a result, it is
always enveloped in clear air.

pokemon.name: Glaceon
pokemon.flavorText:
As a protective technique, it can
completely freeze its fur to make
its hairs stand like needles.

pokemon.name: Sylveon
pokemon.flavorText:
It sends a soothing aura from its
ribbonlike feelers to calm fights.
